attributes.action: Hold  a referendum about England Independence and an English Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
UK held 8 referendums related to the issue of devolution. 2 in Northern Ireland, 3 in Scotland and 3 in Wales.

England  is the only nation in the UK that haven’t  hold a referendum about devolution. 

That is unfair for the People of  England 

 If the English electorate decide to stay in the  UK as was decided by  the Scots and the NIrish all  nations of the UK should have equal grade of devolution aiming for DEVOMAX & FFA within a British Confederation 

More in https://goo.gl/zK5Ox7
attributes.background:
In the EU Referendum 2 questions regarding England's devolution should be added to the ballot paper

Should England become an independent Country?

Should England have an English Parliament with the 4 parliaments having equal grade of devolution aiming for DEVOMAX & Full Fiscal Autonomy?
